code: import*as axiosHelper from"../api_helper";import qs from"qs";export const fetchWithdrawalGatewaysAPI=async()=>{const gateways=await axiosHelper.get("/fxtransactions/withdrawals-gateways");if(!gateways.status){throw new Error(gateways.message);}return gateways;};export const addWithdrawalAPI=async _ref=>{let{payload}=_ref;const result=await axiosHelper.post("/fxtransactions/withdrawals",payload);if(!result.status){throw new Error(result.message);}return result;};export const getDepositsAPI=async params=>{const result=await axiosHelper.post("/fxtransactions/withdrawals?".concat(qs.stringify(params)));if(!result.status){throw new Error(result.message);}return result;};
